name: Cheb Bilal
description: '''Bilal Mouffok''' ({{langx|ar|بلال موفق|Bilāl Muwaffaq}}; born 23 July 1966), known professionally as '''Cheb Bilal''' ({{langx|ar|الشاب بلال|ash-Shābb Bilāl|the Young Bilal|links=no}}), is an [[Algerians|Algerian]] [[raï]] singer, He produces traditional music that includes instruments like congas and violins.{{fact|date=October 2021}}
